name: Planet of Heroes - MOBA 5v5
description:
BEST OF 2017: Planet of Heroes has been nominated as Trend of the Year by Apple! GG, WP!

Conquer the 5v5 map and enjoy the classic MOBA playstyle!

Welcome to Planet of Heroes 3.0! Thousands of players are already fighting: are you up for the challenge? Brawl in PVP with friends, explore challenging missions in the PVE Campaigns, and compete in worldwide Ranked mode!

There is no reason to miss your Moba when away from home – we’ve got a Casual eSports League with an ELO-like system, a PVE Campaign with your champions of the arena, all packed into a fun, action game in your pocket. Of course, playing is free forever!

Want to know our Features?

=== Action Gameplay ===
• Use your mobile like a controller - left thumb steers, right thumb executes!
• 3 lanes, big jungle, ganks and huge bosses: all MOBA features in your pocket!
• Fantasy Story Campaign with your favourite heroes!

=== Strategic Customization ===
• Choose Runes to build your unique skill combinations
• Craft powerful items during the battle!
• Determine your heroes' role, be a tank, support, healer, carry or assassin!

=== Fun without Limits ===
• Challenge players from all around the world - Planet of Heroes is truly global!
• Outdoors? Shaky connection? Doesn't matter: the PvE campaign and Practice mode run on your phone!
• Craft Items, hunt Monsters and Bosses, clash with players, strike down bots, and collect new heroes!
• Great new voice overs and sound effects for even more immersion!

Share your experiences and follow our Social Media channels too:

• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PoHMoba
• VK.com: https://vk.com/poh_moba
• Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/planetofheroes
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/PoHMOBA
• YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/PlanetofHeroes

=== See you on the battlefield, warriors! ===

Please note: Planet of Heroes is free to play and download, however some game items may be acquired with real money, such as skins or consumables. Any purchases do not impact PVP whatsoever.

We have also included the Premium Subscription for iOS device users which will give subscribers:
- Additional 50% on Planetoons and Energons gain after completing a battle
- Access to the Pioneer Duncan Skin for the duration of the subscription
- A crown symbol in front of your name highlighting your support!

The subscription is available in packages of 1 month for $9.99, 3 months for $23.99 and 6 month for $35.99. We also offer a one-time 7 day trial to the 1-month-long subscription during or after which you can opt for any of the subscription packages as described above. Purchase of a subscription will turn the trial period into the full subscription, with the remaining trial days forfeited, and charged to your iTunes account at the confirmation of purchase.

If you wish to cancel the subscription renewal, you may do so in the Account Settings of your iTunes account. Subscriptions renew automatically unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
